title: MUD: an Engine for On-chain Games
description: For the past year and a half, 0xPARC and Lattice have been hard at work building MUD â€” an open-source engine for building on-chain games.  In this talk, Justin and Alvarius from Lattice will be joined by Kelvin Fichter from Optimism, to talk about on-chain games, MUD, and an exciting new collaboration with Optimism to be unveiled on the day.
